name: Soap Sampler Gift Basket
description:
5-Sample size Cold Process soap bars 

-Citrus Shea Butter Soap
-Sweet Orange Mango Butter Soap
-Orange Patchouli Shea Butter Soap
-'Sandy' Shea Butter Soap
-Chamomile-Oats Shea Butter Soap

1 -  4 oz jar of Whipped Butter Love Body and Hair Cream 
1 - Loofah Body Scrub pad 
1 - Muslin Soap Bag Surprise (includes: Rose_Sage, Lemon 'Hemp' seed, Sweet Lavander-Ylang and Aphrodisy soap pieces).

name: Rose and Sage Mango Butter Soap
description:
This Mango butter base soap will leave the skin conditioned and moisturized while the highly “euphoric” blend of Clary sage and Geranium rose uplift and relax your mood.

Ingredients Include:


Organic Mango Butter, distilled water, sodium hydroxide, Coconut oil, Olive oil, Palm kernel oil, Rice Bran oil, Castor oil, Pink Rose flower powder, blend of Clary Sage and Geranium rose essential oils.

name: Lemongrass African Black Soap Shampoo
description:
8oz Bottle

Ingredients include:

Distilled water, Raw African Black soap (Palm Oil, Roasted Cocoa Pods, Plantain skins),  Jojoba oil, Extra Virgin Coconut oil, Extra Virgin Olive oil, Vegetable glycerin (humectants), Rosemary Essential oil, Tea tree Essential Oil, Lemongrass Essential Oil, Grapefruit Seed Extract (preservative), Xanthan Gum (Thickener).

name: Peppermint Hair Conditioner
description:
8oz Bottle Leave-in or rinse out conditioner.

Ingredients include:

Organic Aloe Vera gel, organic chamomile infused water, organic babassu butter, behentrimonium methosulfate, cetearyl alcohol,   organic extra virgin olive oil, wildharvested apricot kernel oil, organic glycerin, silk amino acids, hydrolyzed oat protein, glyceryl stearate, sodium stearoyl lactylate, panthenol DL, Vitamin E acetate, rosemary seed extract, vitamin C, vitamin B3, vitamin B5, vitamin B6, lauric acid (preservative), and caprylyl glycol (preservative), Safflower oil, Avocado oil, Jamaican Black Castor oil and Peppermint essential oil.

name: Whipped Butter Love 4 oz. Jar
description:
This blend of Shea Butter, Mango Butter, Kokum Butter and natural carrier oils have been whipped into a cream that will make your body and hair fall in love. This cream absorbs very easily, moisturizes and hydrates dry skin while restoring its natural elasticity.  All butters used are organic and unrefined and the use of Kokum Butter gives this cream a slightly, firmer texture than most whipped butters. A little really goes a long way. The hint of orange spice essential oils will leave your skin refreshed, rejuvenated and smelling "oh so" good. 

Ingredients include:

Unrefined Shea butter, Unrefined Mango butter, Kokum butter, extra virgin Coconut oil, Olive Oil, Jojoba oil, Avocado oil, Sweet Almond oil, Vitamin E oil and a spice blend of Sweet Orange, Cinnamon and Vanilla essential oils.

name: Coco-Lime Mango Butter Soap
description:
This Mango butter base soap contains pure coconut milk which is extremely high in fat and a perfect cleanser to use on the skin. Coconut is full of antioxidants and healing properties such as Vitamin E. The blend of Lime and Lemongrass essential oils adds a citrus scent that is refreshing, stimulating and deodorizing.

Ingredients include: 

Organic Mango butter, distilled water, Sodium hydroxide, Coconut oil, Palm kernel oil, Rice bran oil, Safflower oil, Wheat germ oil, blend of Lime and Lemongrass essential oils and Coconut milk.

name: Aphrodisy-Luxury Soap
description:
This Shea and Mango Butter luxury soap is deeply moisturizing and will nourish and hydrate all skin types. The essential blend of Patchouli, Geranium rose and Jasmine provides a gentle euphoric scent with “aphrodisiac” properties.

Ingredients include:

Organic Shea Butter, Organic Mango Butter, distilled water, Sodium hydroxide, Coconut oil, Olive oil, Palm kernel oil, Rice Bran oil, Castor oil, Safflower Oil and Jasmine Infused Sweet Almond oil, blend of Patchouli and Geranium rose essential oils and Jasmine fragrance oil.

name: Orange Patchouli Shea Butter Soap
description:
This Shea Butter base soap is extremely moisturizing and soothing. The added benefits of the “hippy” oil Patchouli promotes healing, rejuvenates and regulates oily skin. A blend of the earthy Patchouli scent and sweet Orange aroma adds a sensuous, exotic note to this bar.

Ingredients include:

Organic Shea Butter, distilled water, sodium hydroxide, Coconut oil, Olive oil, Palm kernel oil, Rice Bran oil, Castor oil, blend of Patchouli and Sweet Orange essential oils.

name: Hibiscus Rose Shea Butter Soap
description:
This Shea butter base soap will leave the skin soft and well conditioned, while the romantic scents of Hibiscus flower and Geranium rose ease the stress away.

Ingredients include:

Organic Shea Butter, distilled water, sodium hydroxide, Coconut oil, Olive oil, Palm kernel oil, Rice Bran oil, Castor oil, Hibiscus flower infused water, Geranium rose essential oil and  Rose fragrance oil.

name: Chamomile-Oat Shea Butter Soap
description:
This Shea Butter base soap is great for problem or sensitive skin. The added benefits of infused chamomile oil, sweet almond oil, lavender essential and oats helps to treat dry skin, alleviate irritations and moisturize while softly exfoliating. 

Ingredients include:

Organic Shea Butter , distilled water, sodium hydroxide, Coconut oil, Olive oil, Palm kernel oil, Rice bran oil, Sweet Almond oil, Chamomile Infused olive oil, Wheat germ oil, Avocado oil, Lavender essential oil and organic steel cut oats.

name: Lemon ‘Hemp’ Seed Soap
description:
This oil based soap is very mild and moisturizing. The added benefits of Hempseed oil and lemongrass essential will leave your skin refreshed, deodorized, smooth and soft while helping it retain moisture.

Ingredients include:

Organic Hempseed oil, distilled water, sodium hydroxide, Coconut oil, Olive oil, Palm kernel oil, Avocado oil, Wheat germ oil and Lemongrass essential oil.

name: ‘Sandy’ Shea Butter Soap
description:
This Shea Butter based soap will cleanse and moisturize the skin and the gentle, erotic scent of lemon and sandalwood appeal to the senses of both men and women.

Ingredients include:

Organic Shea Butter, distilled water, sodium hydroxide, Coconut oil, Palm kernel oil, Olive oil, Rice bran oil, Castor oil, blend of lemon essential oil and smooth Sandalwood fragrance oil.

name: Sweet Orange Mango Butter Soap
description:
This Mango butter base soap will cleanse, moisturize and soften the skin with the help of Avocado oil nutrients. The blend of sweet orange and mango provides a refreshing fragrance to delight all the senses. 

Ingredients include:

Organic Mango Butter, distilled water, sodium hydroxide, Avocado Oil, Coconut oil, Palm kernel oil, Olive oil, Castor oil, Rice Bran oil, Sweet orange essential oil and Mango fragrance oil

name: Sweet Lavander-Ylang Shea Butter Soap
description:
This Shea Butter base soap will cleanse and moisturize the skin while the essential oil blend of Lavender, Ylang Ylang and Sweet Orange provide a soothing, calming and balance to the skin and mood.

Ingredients include:

Organic Shea Butter, distilled water, sodium hydroxide, Palm kernel oil, Olive oil, Coconut oil, Castor oil, Rice Bran oil, Lavender flower powder, blend of Lavender, Ylang Ylang and Sweet Orange essential oils.

name: Peppermint African Black Soap Shampoo
description:
8oz Bottle

Ingredients include:

Distilled water, Raw African Black soap (Palm Oil, Roasted Cocoa Pods, Plantain skins),  Jojoba oil, Extra Virgin Coconut oil, Extra Virgin Olive oil, Vegetable glycerin (humectants), Rosemary Essential oil, Tea tree Essential Oil, Peppermint Essential Oil, Grapefruit Seed Extract (preservative), Xanthan Gum (Thickener).

name: Lemongrass Hair Conditioner
description:
8oz Bottle Leave-in or rinse out conditioner.

Ingredients include:

Organic Aloe Vera gel, organic chamomile infused water, organic babassu butter, behentrimonium methosulfate, cetearyl alcohol,   organic extra virgin olive oil, wildharvested apricot kernel oil, organic glycerin, silk amino acids, hydrolyzed oat protein, glyceryl stearate, sodium stearoyl lactylate, panthenol DL, Vitamin E acetate, rosemary seed extract, vitamin C, vitamin B3, vitamin B5, vitamin B6, lauric acid (preservative), and caprylyl glycol (preservative), Safflower oil, Avocado oil, Jamaican Black Castor oil and Lemongrass essential oil.

name: Citrus Shea Butter Soap
description:
This Shea butter base soap is rich in the antioxidant D-Limonene which provides an antiseptic effect on the skin. The citrus blended smells will be sure to uplift, invigorate and bring about a sense of well being. The added Shea butter moisturizes, soothes and is excellent for dry skin.

Ingredients include:

Organic Shea Butter, distilled water, sodium hydroxide, Coconut oil, Palm kernel oil, Olive oil, Castor oil, Rice Bran oil, Lemon peel powder. Citrus blend essential oils that include Grapefruit, Sweet orange, Tangerine and Lemon.
